newsitem.title: USA: Unisys launches joint retailer product.
newsitem.headline: Unisys launches joint retailer product.

text.p: Unisys Corp and Information Advantage said on Tuesday that they launched a joint product to provide retailers with category management measurements and analysis.

The product, called Category Management Solution Suite, is available immediately. Pricing is dependent on the specific package purchased. Information Advantage said the product helps retailers maintain sufficient inventory and increase profitability. Unisys provides information management solutions and consulting.
Information Advantage provides business analysis software applications and toolsets.
